title: This Unstoppable Robot Could Save Your Life
author: Veritasium
description:
This robot has applications to archaeology, space exploration, and search and rescue — with a simple elegant design inspired by a plant. Sign up to Morning Brew for free today: https://ve42.co/mb

Make your own Vine Robot! — https://www.vinerobots.org
Special thanks to A/Prof. Elliot Hawkes, Nicholas Naclerio, Margaret Coad, David Haggerty for appearing in this video and showing off your amazing robots. For more info on vine (and other types of) robots check out https://ve42.co/HawkesLab, and https://ve42.co/CHARM

B-roll footage of robots from the supplementary materials of (Hawkes et al., 2017) https://ve42.co/VineVideos, and from Stanford University https://ve42.co/StanfordVideo

Additional info on the intubation vine robot here: https://www.wardenchem.com/vine

References: Hawkes, E. W., Blumenschein, L. H., Greer, J. D., & Okamura, A. M. (2017). A soft robot that navigates its environment through growth. Science Robotics, 2(8). — https://ve42.co/Hawkes2017

Coad, M. M., Blumenschein, L. H., Cutler, S., Zepeda, J. A. R., Naclerio, N. D., El-Hussieny, H., ... & Okamura, A. M. (2019). Vine robots: Design, teleoperation, and deployment for navigation and exploration. IEEE Robotics & Automation Magazine, 27(3), 120-132. — https://ve42.co/Coad2019

Blumenschein, L. H., Coad, M. M., Haggerty, D. A., Okamura, A. M., & Hawkes, E. W. (2020). Design, modeling, control, and application of everting vine robots. Frontiers in Robotics and AI, 7. — https://ve42.co/Blumenschein2020

Haggerty, D. A., Naclerio, N. D., & Hawkes, E. W. (2019, November). Characterizing environmental interactions for soft growing robots. In 2019 IEEE/RSJ International Conference on Intelligent Robots and Systems (IROS) (pp. 3335-3342). IEEE. — https://ve42.co/Haggerty2019

Naclerio, N. D., Hubicki, C. M., Aydin, Y. O., Goldman, D. I., & Hawkes, E. W. (2018, October). Soft robotic burrowing device with tip-extension and granular fluidization. In 2018 IEEE/RSJ International Conference on Intelligent Robots and Systems (IROS) (pp. 5918-5923). IEEE. — https://ve42.co/Naclerio19

Special thanks to Patreon supporters: Anna, Mac Malkawi, Michael Schneider, Oleksii Leonov, Jim Osmun, Tyson McDowell, Ludovic Robillard, jim buckmaster, fanime96, Juan Benet, Ruslan Khroma, Robert Blum, Richard Sundvall, Lee Redden, Vincent, Marinus Kuivenhoven, Alfred Wallace, Arjun Chakroborty, Joar Wandborg, Clayton Greenwell, Pindex, Michael Krugman, Cy 'kkm' K'Nelson, Sam Lutfi, Ron Neal


Edited by Trenton Oliver
Animation by Ivan Tello
Filmed by Derek Muller
Thumbnail by Ignat Berbeci
Music by Jonny Hyman and from Epidemic Sound https://epidemicsound.com

localize.description:
植物をモチーフにしたシンプルでエレガントなデザインで、考古学、宇宙開発、捜索救助などに応用できるロボットです。今すぐ無料でMorning Brewに登録しましょう。https://ve42.co/mb

自分だけのVineロボットを作ろう - https://www.vinerobots.org
このビデオに出演し、素晴らしいロボットを披露してくれたA/Prof. Elliot Hawkes、Nicholas Naclerio、Margaret Coad、David Haggertyに感謝します。つるつるロボットの詳細については、https://ve42.co/HawkesLab と https://ve42.co/CHARM をご覧ください。

B-roll footage of robots from the supplementary materials of (Hawkes et al., 2017) https://ve42.co/VineVideos, from Stanford University https://ve42.co/StanfordVideo

挿管用つるつるロボットの追加情報はこちら： https://www.wardenchem.com/vine

参考文献をご紹介します。Hawkes, E. W., Blumenschein, L. H., Greer, J. D., & Okamura, A. M. (2017). 成長によって環境をナビゲートするソフトロボット。Science Robotics, 2(8). - https://ve42.co/Hawkes2017

Coad, M. M., Blumenschein, L. H., Cutler, S., Zepeda, J. A. R., Naclerio, N. D., El-Hussieny, H., ... & Okamura, A. M. (2019). バインロボット。ナビゲーションと探索のための設計，遠隔操作，展開．IEEE Robotics & Automation Magazine, 27(3), 120-132. - https://ve42.co/Coad2019

Blumenschein, L.H., Coad, M.M., Haggerty, D.A., Okamura, A.M., & Hawkes, E.W. (2020). 蔓の常設ロボットの設計、モデリング、制御、および応用。Frontiers in Robotics and AI, 7. - https://ve42.co/Blumenschein2020

Haggerty, D. A., Naclerio, N. D., & Hawkes, E. W. (2019, November). ソフトグロウイングロボットのための環境相互作用の特徴づけ。In 2019 IEEE/RSJ International Conference on Intelligent Robots and Systems (IROS) (pp.3335-3342). IEEEです。- https://ve42.co/Haggerty2019

Naclerio, N. D., Hubicki, C. M., Aydin, Y. O., Goldman, D. I., & Hawkes, E. W. (2018, October). 先端拡張と粒状流体化を備えたソフトロボットの埋没装置。In 2018 IEEE/RSJ International Conference on Intelligent Robots and Systems (IROS) (pp.5918-5923). IEEEです。- https://ve42.co/Naclerio19

Patreonサポーターの皆様に感謝いたします。Anna, Mac Malkawi, Michael Schneider, Oleksii Leonov, Jim Osmun, Tyson McDowell, Ludovic Robillard, jim Buckmaster, fanime96, Juan Benet, Ruslan Khroma, Robert Blum, Richard Sundvall, Lee Redden, Vincent, Marinus Kuivenhoven, Alfred Wallace, Arjun Chakroborty, Joar Wandborg, Clayton Greenwell, Pindex, Michael Krugman, Cy 'kkm' K'Nelson, Sam Lutfi, Ron Neal


編集：Trenton Oliver
アニメーション：Ivan Tello
撮影：Derek Muller
サムネイル：Ignat Berbeci
Music by Jonny Hyman and from Epidemic Sound https://epidemicsound.com
localize.title: この止められないロボットは、あなたの命を救うかもしれません。

localize.description:
这款机器人的应用范围包括考古、太空探索和搜救--设计灵感来源于植物，简单优雅。今天就免费注册Morning Brew：https://ve42.co/mb。

自制藤蔓机器人! - https://www.vinerobots.org
特别感谢Elliot Hawkes教授、Nicholas Naclerio、Margaret Coad、David Haggerty出现在这段视频中，并展示了你们神奇的机器人。关于藤蔓（和其他类型）机器人的更多信息，请查看https://ve42.co/HawkesLab，以及https://ve42.co/CHARM。

机器人的B-roll镜头来自（Hawkes等人，2017）https://ve42.co/VineVideos，以及斯坦福大学https://ve42.co/StanfordVideo 的补充材料。

关于插管藤蔓机器人的其他信息，请点击：https://www.wardenchem.com/vine。

参考文献。Hawkes, E. W., Blumenschein, L. H., Greer, J. D., & Okamura, A. M. (2017). A soft robot that navigates its environment through growth. Science Robotics，2（8）。- https://ve42.co/Hawkes2017

Coad, M. M., Blumenschein, L. H., Cutler, S., Zepeda, J. A. R., Naclerio, N. D., El-Hussieny, H., ... & Okamura, A. M. (2019). 藤蔓机器人。Design, teleoperation, and deployment for navigation and exploration.IEEE Robotics & Automation Magazine, 27, and Okamura, A. M.(2019). IEEE Robotics & Automation Magazine，27（3），120-132。- https://ve42.co/Coad2019

Blumenschein, L. H., Coad, M. M., Haggerty, D. A., Okamura, A. M., & Hawkes, E. W. (2020). Design, modeling, control, and application of everting vine robots. Frontiers in Robotics and AI, 7. - https://ve42.co/Blumenschein2020。

Haggerty, D. A., Naclerio, N. D., & Hawkes, E. W.（2019年11月）。Characterizing environmental interactions for soft growing robots. In 2019 IEEE/RSJ International Conference on Intelligent Robots and Systems（IROS）（pp.3335-3342）. IEEE. - https://ve42.co/Haggerty2019

Naclerio, N. D., Hubicki, C. M., Aydin, Y. O., Goldman, D. I., & Hawkes, E. W. (2018, October). 具有尖端延伸和颗粒流化的软机器人钻探装置。In 2018 IEEE/RSJ International Conference on Intelligent Robots and Systems（IROS）（pp.5918-5923）. IEEE. - https://ve42.co/Naclerio19

特别感谢Patreon的支持者。Anna, Mac Malkawi, Michael Schneider, Oleksii Leonov, Jim Osmun, Tyson McDowell, Ludovic Robillard, jim buckmaster, fanime96, Juan Benet, Ruslan Khroma, Robert Blum, Richard Sundvall, Lee Redden、Vincent、Marinus Kuivenhoven、Alfred Wallace、Arjun Chakroborty、Joar Wandborg、Clayton Greenwell、Pindex、Michael Krugman、Cy'kkm' K'Nelson、Sam Lutfi、Ron Neal。


编辑：Trenton Oliver
动画：Ivan Tello
拍摄者：Derek Muller
缩略图：Ignat Berbeci
音乐由Jonny Hyman创作，来自Epidemic Sound https://epidemicsound.com。
localize.title: 这个不可阻挡的机器人可能会拯救你的生命。

localize.description:
這款機器人的應用範圍包括考古、太空探索和搜救--設計靈感來源於植物，簡單優雅。今天就免費註冊Morning Brew：https://ve42.co/mb。

自制藤蔓機器人! - https://www.vinerobots.org
特別感謝Elliot Hawkes教授、Nicholas Naclerio、Margaret Coad、David Haggerty出現在這段視頻中，並展示了你們神奇的機器人。關於藤蔓（和其他類型）機器人的更多信息，請查看https://ve42.co/HawkesLab，以及https://ve42.co/CHARM。

機器人的B-roll鏡頭來自（Hawkes等人，2017）https://ve42.co/VineVideos，以及斯坦福大學https://ve42.co/StanfordVideo 的補充材料。

關於插管藤蔓機器人的其他信息，請點擊：https://www.wardenchem.com/vine。

參考文獻。Hawkes, E. W., Blumenschein, L. H., Greer, J. D., & Okamura, A. M. (2017). A soft robot that navigates its environment through growth. Science Robotics，2（8）。- https://ve42.co/Hawkes2017

Coad, M. M., Blumenschein, L. H., Cutler, S., Zepeda, J. A. R., Naclerio, N. D., El-Hussieny, H., ... & Okamura, A. M. (2019). 藤蔓機器人。Design, teleoperation, and deployment for navigation and exploration.IEEE Robotics & Automation Magazine, 27, and Okamura, A. M.(2019). IEEE Robotics & Automation Magazine，27（3），120-132。- https://ve42.co/Coad2019

Blumenschein, L. H., Coad, M. M., Haggerty, D. A., Okamura, A. M., & Hawkes, E. W. (2020). Design, modeling, control, and application of everting vine robots. Frontiers in Robotics and AI, 7. - https://ve42.co/Blumenschein2020。

Haggerty, D. A., Naclerio, N. D., & Hawkes, E. W.（2019年11月）。Characterizing environmental interactions for soft growing robots. In 2019 IEEE/RSJ International Conference on Intelligent Robots and Systems（IROS）（pp.3335-3342）. IEEE. - https://ve42.co/Haggerty2019

Naclerio, N. D., Hubicki, C. M., Aydin, Y. O., Goldman, D. I., & Hawkes, E. W. (2018, October). 具有尖端延伸和顆粒流化的軟機器人鑽探裝置。In 2018 IEEE/RSJ International Conference on Intelligent Robots and Systems（IROS）（pp.5918-5923）. IEEE. - https://ve42.co/Naclerio19

特別感謝Patreon的支持者。Anna, Mac Malkawi, Michael Schneider, Oleksii Leonov, Jim Osmun, Tyson McDowell, Ludovic Robillard, jim buckmaster, fanime96, Juan Benet, Ruslan Khroma, Robert Blum, Richard Sundvall, Lee Redden、Vincent、Marinus Kuivenhoven、Alfred Wallace、Arjun Chakroborty、Joar Wandborg、Clayton Greenwell、Pindex、Michael Krugman、Cy'kkm' K'Nelson、Sam Lutfi、Ron Neal。


編輯：Trenton Oliver
動畫：Ivan Tello
拍攝者：Derek Muller
縮略圖：Ignat Berbeci
音樂由Jonny Hyman創作，來自Epidemic Sound https://epidemicsound.com。
